generated_description: dana foundation, legally known as dana welfare foundation society, is a non-profit, volunteer-based organization established in 2020. the organization primarily focuses on providing educational support to underprivileged children in india, with the aim of breaking the cycle of poverty. dana foundation operates from its india headquarters in bhopal and collaborates with other ngos to achieve its mission. the organization supports children with tuition fees, provides mentorship through volunteers, and offers vocational training to help youth from financially disadvantaged backgrounds enter the workforce. dana foundation is registered as a charity and relies on donations to support its initiatives.
